TopicTitle: What is this mod called? (Navball instruments on surface)

Articles.Content:
Hi KSP Community,

Today I scrolled down the KSP Facebook site and they posted a link to their

Twitch site. I watched some of the Videos they had there and saw a very useful mod

in this Video at 0:45 sec -> http://www.twitch.tv/ksptv/c/5516992

Does somebody know the name of this modification? I searched for every possibility

this mod could be called/described by but I didn't find anything like what I saw.

Sorry for my bad english, it's not my native language.

Greetings, BdBY
I think it's NavHud-a-NavBall-inspired-Heads-Up-Display-1-1-2?highlight=navball+hud, I haven't tried it but it's the only similar thing I've seen.
